name: PrayBack
description:
Your temple is attacked by enemies from across the country and the only option is to fight them!

But there's a twist, you can only attack if you parry an attack - gain energy from the enemies and hit them back with twice the power to show them! The objective is to survive the longest using your skill against the foes, can you make it far? 

SHARE YOUR RESULTS!

Controls:

- WASD/LS to move;

- MOUSE2/RB to parry;

- MOUSE1/RT to attack;

- SPACE/LT to roll;

2nd place at Invictvs Game Jam 2021

Made by:

Cavacos (@cavacoskz) - Programmer

Naidio (Ricardo Teixeira) - Programmer

Zarc (@jcccastanheira) - Artist

SRP - Artist, Programmer

Joao () - Sound Artist
